Description:
Interfere in technical meetings with clients concerning products he/she is leading if possible
Keep track of raised issues and discussions concerning the product
Discuss new specifications concerning the product with system analysts
Keep a log of bugs and solutions (version release notes)
Quality control the project
Suggest technologies to develop the project on
Co-operate with project manager on implementation phases and plans
Discuss requirements and specifications with project manager
Participate in Analysis of requirements
Assign work to the developers and Quality Assurance Department
Record tasks in daily worksheets
Make plans for implementation of different products at the client site
Apply the exact deal done by company with the client
Responsible for the documents related to the project
Help project manager Schedule project implementation
Evaluate Developers and report to sub department managerSkills
Skills:
BS or BE in Computer Science / CCE or equivalent
At least 7 years' experience in .NET Development
